SEARCH
Package org.application.timeslots

Interface ITimeslotsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeslotsService
public interface ITimeslotsService
Represents a service interface for managing Timeslot entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to timeslot service.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addTimeslot

      Timeslot addTimeslot(Date startDate, Date endDate, Date time, Duration duration, Timeslot.Day day, Timeslot.Periodicity periodicity, Room room, Session session) throws TimeslotAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Timeslot with the given start date, end date, time, duration, day, periodicity, room and session.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the new Timeslot.
      endDate - The end date of the new Timeslot.
      time - The time of the new Timeslot.
      duration - The duration of the new Timeslot.
      day - The day of the new Timeslot.
      periodicity - The periodicity of the new Timeslot.
      room - The room of the new Timeslot.
      session - The session of the new Timeslot.
      Returns:
      The newly created Timeslot.
      Throws:
      TimeslotAdditionException - If the Timeslot could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided start date, end date, time, duration, day, periodicity, room or session are invalid.

    • addTimeslot

      Timeslot addTimeslot(Date startDate, Date endDate, Date time, Duration duration, Timeslot.Day day, Timeslot.Periodicity periodicity, String roomName, String disciplineName) throws TimeslotAdditionException, SessionNotFoundException, DisciplineNotFoundException, RoomNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Timeslot with the given start date, end date, time, duration, day, periodicity, room name and discipline name.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the new Timeslot.
      endDate - The end date of the new Timeslot.
      time - The time of the new Timeslot.
      duration - The duration of the new Timeslot.
      day - The day of the new Timeslot.
      periodicity - The periodicity of the new Timeslot.
      roomName - The room name of the new Timeslot.
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the new Timeslot.
      Returns:
      The newly created Timeslot.
      Throws:
      TimeslotAdditionException - If the Timeslot could not be added.
      SessionNotFoundException - If the session could not be found.
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the discipline could not be found.
      RoomNotFoundException - If the room could not be found.
      ValidationException - If the provided start date, end date, time, duration, day, periodicity, room name or discipline name are invalid.

    • deleteTimeslot

      boolean deleteTimeslot(int timeslotId) throws TimeslotNotFoundException, TimeslotDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes the Timeslot with the given id.
      Parameters:
      timeslotId - The id of the Timeslot to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the Timeslot was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TimeslotNotFoundException - If the Timeslot could not be found.
      TimeslotDeletionFailed - If the Timeslot could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteTimeslot

      boolean deleteTimeslot(Date startDate, Date time, Duration duration, String roomName) throws TimeslotNotFoundException, TimeslotDeletionFailed, RoomNotFoundException
      Deletes the Timeslot with the given start date, time, duration and room name.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the Timeslot to be deleted.
      time - The time of the Timeslot to be deleted.
      duration - The duration of the Timeslot to be deleted.
      roomName - The room name of the Timeslot to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the Timeslot was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TimeslotNotFoundException - If the Timeslot could not be found.
      TimeslotDeletionFailed - If the Timeslot could not be deleted.
      RoomNotFoundException - If the room could not be found.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws TimeslotDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Timeslots.
      Returns:
      True if all Timeslots were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TimeslotDeletionFailed - If the Timeslots could not be deleted.

    • getTimeslotById

      Timeslot getTimeslotById(int timeslotId) throws TimeslotNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Gets the Timeslot with the given id.
      Parameters:
      timeslotId - The id of the Timeslot to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Timeslot with the given id.
      Throws:
      TimeslotNotFoundException - If the Timeslot could not be found.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • getTimeslots

      List<Timeslot> getTimeslots()
      Retrieves all Timeslots from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Timeslots.

    • getSortedTimeslotsByStartDateAndTime

      List<Timeslot> getSortedTimeslotsByStartDateAndTime()
      Retrieves all Timeslots sorted by start date and time.
      Returns:
      A list of all Timeslots sorted by start date and time.

    • getSortedTimeslotsByStartTime

      List<Timeslot> getSortedTimeslotsByStartTime()
      Retrieves all Timeslots sorted by start time.
      Returns:
      A list of all Timeslots sorted by start time.
